sentence.Network_en: The Assamese variety can grow 18 meters high and lives about 40 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿萨姆的品种能长到18公尺高并存活约40年.

means.word_mean: 1. native or inhabitant of the state of Assam in northeastern India
2. the Magadhan language spoken by the Assamese people; closely related to Bengali
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Assam or its people or culture

auth_sentence.content: Groups of Assamese have been fighting immigrants from Bangladesh with machetes, petrol bombs and stones.
auth_sentence.res_content: Groups of Assamese have been fighting immigrants from Bangladesh with machetes, petrol bombs and stones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Groups of Assamese have been fighting immigrants from Bangladesh with machetes, petrol bombs and stones.

auth_sentence.content: The Assamese rebels say they have moved men and materials to the jungles of Meghalaya and western and northern Assam.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Assamese rebels say they have moved men and materials to the jungles of Meghalaya and western and northern Assam.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Assamese rebels say they have moved men and materials to the jungles of Meghalaya and western and northern Assam.
